title: Font for sticker.
content:
Need help identifying fonts from this sticker, please! :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-23 at 10.11.19 AM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-23%20at%2010.11.19%20AM.png) | 720.18 KB |
author: jennmertle

comments.content:
ELECTRONIC PROTECTION: [Helvetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica) Bold Oblique or slanted  
EEP ALLEY ECURITY: same ol' Helvetica but Black  
D V S: try [Lubalin Graph](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Lubalin+graph)/ [Glypha](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Glypha)/ [Boton](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Boton)  
BURGLARY FIRE: hard to say, most probably stretched, may be [Frutiger](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824085121/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/frutiger) Black Italic...  
(707) 462-5200: still Helvetica
